data.text:
Elsa Elsa Pataky is a popular Spanish actress, model and film producer. For several years, she was better known internationally as ‘Elena Neves’, the name of her character in the ‘Fast and Furious’ franchise.

What is Elsa Pataky’s net worth? Salary, Earnings

Elsa Pataky is a Spanish model, actress and producer with a net worth of $50 million. It is worth mentioning that since 2010, the majority of Elsa’s net worth comes from her joint interests with her husband, actor Chris Hemsworth.

Where was Elsa Pataky born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family

Elsa Lafuente Medianu was born in the Spanish capital of Madrid. Her birthday is July 18, 1976. Elsa’s zodiac sign is Cancer and she will turn 44 in 2020. Her mother’s name is Cristina Medianu Pataky and her father’s name is José Francisco Lafuente .

Elsa’s mother is a well-known publicist, while her father is a Spanish biochemist. Cristian Prieto Medianu, her younger half-brother, is also a model. He works as a director of photography for a photographer. Pataky’s mother is of Hungarian and Romanian descent.

Education

Elsa studied journalism at the CEU San Pablo University. She also began attending acting classes to achieve her dream of becoming an actress. She has studied languages ​​throughout her youth and beginnings as an actress and speaks fluent English, Italian and French, as well as Spanish and Romanian.

Pataky was also a member of the Madrid theater company ‘Teatro Cámara de Ángel Gutiérrez’ and dropped out of university after being cast in the local Spanish television series ‘Al Salir de Clase’ in 1997. Many of Pataky’s later films were co-productions between the United Kingdom and France, which allowed him to learn both French and English. This also helped her career.

Is Elsa Pataky married? Relationship

Elsa was in a relationship with French actor Michal Youn from 2004 to 2006. You broke up with her after realizing she was cheating on him. As a result, he intended to surprise her on her birthday while she was in Canada filming Snakes on a Plane, but when she arrived at her hotel, he caught her kissing one of the film’s producers. She returned to Paris after giving him a bouquet she had bought him.

Pataky began dating American actor Adrien Brody in 2006. In 2007, Brody surprised her with a massive 19th-century mansion in upstate New York for her 31st birthday. The couple was later photographed relaxing at his New York home and was featured in a 30-page article in the October 2008 issue of ‘HELLO!’ magazine. However, they divorced in 2009.

In early 2010, Pataky began dating Australian actor Chris Hemsworth. They met as part of their combined management team, ‘ROAR’. Pataky and Hemsworth married on December 26, 2010, after being engaged for 5 months. India Rose Hemsworth was born in May 2012, while Tristan and Sasha Hemsworth were born in March 2014.

How tall is Elsa Pataky? Weight, hair color

Elsa is 5 feet 3 inches tall and weighs around 51 kg. Her chest, waist and hip measurements are also 34-24-33 inches. Her body is thin. She also wears a size 4 (US) dress. Elsa has beautiful blue eyes and light blonde hair.

How did Elsa Pataky start her Professional Career?

Pataky appeared in the American television series ‘Queen of Swords (2000). She appears in 14 episodes as ‘Señora Vera Hidalgo’. However, the series was a failure and ended after only a few episodes were broadcast. She also had a recurring role as a young actress in the Spanish television series ‘Los Serrano’ as a young teacher in love with her student. She despite appearing in 11 episodes of the long-running show.

With appearances in more than 18 films and three television shows, his success in Spain has been astonishing. She has also participated in several national endorsements and has made several celebrity appearances. ‘The Art of Dying’, his first film, was a tremendous success in Spain.

He has also continually worked in a wide range of film genres, including comedy, action, drama and thriller. His portrayal of the title character in the comedy film ‘NINETTE’ (2005), written and produced by Oscar winner José Luis Garci, earned him universal recognition. Pataky’s reputation as a rising star and potential leading man was also confirmed.

Social media details

Elsa is a frequent user of social networks. @elsapataky has more than 5.2 million followers on Instagram. She is active on Twitter and has more than 77.4 thousand followers. Meanwhile, her official Facebook page has more than 331,000 followers.
